questions.question: 单数：tomato
questions.explanation: tomato以辅音+o结尾，有生命，加es，复数为tomatoes

questions.question: 单数：photo
questions.explanation: photo以辅音+o结尾，但属于无生命/外来词，加s，复数为photos

questions.question: 单数：potato
questions.explanation: potato以辅音+o结尾，有生命，加es，复数为potatoes

questions.question: 单数：piano
questions.explanation: piano以辅音+o结尾，但属于无生命/外来词，加s，复数为pianos

questions.question: I like ______.
questions.explanation: 根据语境应填复数，tomato以辅音+o结尾，加es变为tomatoes

questions.explanation: radio以元音+o结尾，加s，复数为radios

questions.question: She took many ______.
questions.explanation: many提示复数，photo属于外来词，加s变为photos
